Legendary Resistance (3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Legendary Resistance (3/Day).description: If the ooze fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The ooze uses Engulf and makes three Pseudopod attacks.

Engulf.name: 吞没
Engulf.description:
The ooze moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Gargantuan or smaller creatures’ spaces. Whenever the ooze enters a creature’s space, the creature must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw.

On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the ooze. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the ooze enters the creature’s space, and the creature takes 21 ([[/r 2d20]]) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can’t breathe, is restrained, and takes 42 ([[/r 4d20]]) acid damage at the start of each of the ooze’s turns. When the ooze moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.

An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 21 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the ooze.

Attack.name: 攻击
Attack.description: The ooze makes one Pseudopod attack.

Pseudopod.name: 伪足
Pseudopod.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft. , one target. Hit: 14 ([[/r 4d6]]) acid damage and the target suffers one of the following random effects (roll a [[/r d20]]):

Foundry note: Use the "other formula" d20 roll to determine what happens using the table below.

1. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) force damage.

2. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) bludgeoning damage.

3. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) piercing damage.

4. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) slashing damage.

5. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) fire damage.

6. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) cold damage.

7. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) lightning damage.

8. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) thunder damage.

9. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) necrotic damage.

10. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) radiant damage.

11. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) poison damage.

12. The target takes 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) psychic damage.

13. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be restrained. The target or a creature within reach of the target can use its action to make a DC 21 Strength check, freeing the restrained creature on a success.

14. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or be afflicted by the confusion spell for 1 minute*.

15. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be afflicted by the reduce effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1 minute*.

16. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be afflicted by the enlarge effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.WahI41a3goVUg0x1]{enlarge/reduce} spell for 1 minute*.

17. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or be afflicted by the @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.spells-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.31GphTAUuhbv13xf]{zippit}. ** spell for 1 minute*.

18. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) until it finishes a long rest. The ooze regains a number of hit points equal to this value. A creature whose hit point maximum is reduced to 0 dies.

19. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be engulfed by the ooze.

20. Roll twice more on this table.

*These spells don’t require concentration. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

**See Appendix B.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Reactive Mutations.name: Reactive Mutations
Reactive Mutations.description: Whenever the ooze takes damage, it gains resistance to that damage type immediately afterwards. The ooze can have up to two resistances from this trait. If the ooze has its maximum number of resistances, the oldest resistance is lost when a new one is gained.

Gelatinooze.name: Gelatinooze
Gelatinooze.description:
Foundry Note: Assign the gelatinooze's Challenge Rating (CR) to your Tamer level for the correct proficiency bonus.

Gelatinooze

You can pet it. But I’d vear gloves. And not your favourite, fancy-pants vons either; you never know vhen its goink to start oozink.

— Humperdink, No Longer Has Gloves

Type: Ooze

Creature Component: Any polyhedrooze

Bonus Tamer Improvement: @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.1xzjcGToFtP4L99I]{Growth I} and +2 Hit Dice

A relatively recent creation, the gelatinous polyhedrooze builds on its forebears’ mere six sides. Able to more selectively dissolve the objects it engulfs, this companion makes use of the arms and armour found lying around dungeons to form impenetrable barriers of overlapping shields and phalanx-like spears.

If any of the gelatinooze's traits or actions require saving throws, it is always against the gelatinooze's save DC, as calculated below.

Save DC = 8 + the tamer’s proficiency bonus + the gelatinooze's Strength modifier

Gelatinooze Improvements

Tamer LevelChoices
1@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.1xzjcGToFtP4L99I]{Growth I}
3@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.FrgFzeps4rvnX99A]{Engulf}@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.2sPs3CtBeBXTBz1u]{Reactive Mutation}
5@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.2rI4jeJiV4yYUGwS]{Multiattack}@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.IQc5WK41PVelSsi9]{Spit}@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.5x72YDOmMjaBXn2M]{Growth II}
9@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.ffBK1Rq5xNLUppYy]{Turtle}@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.QvR2nULe7pdSuFlX]{Phalanx}@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.JZjLZmVYDjmpaEmE]{Growth III}
13@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.virglFPkff54eFKm]{Sanctuary}@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.FAtWePMEgx2zIFCc]{Growth IV}
17@UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.Rvzr4HYq5oG2g9Gn]{Erupt}

Acidic Touch.name: Acidic Touch
Acidic Touch.description: At the start of the gelatinooze’s turn, it can choose to secrete a small dose of acid (no action required). Each creature that is grappling it or that it is grappling takes acid damage equal to the gelatinooze’s Constitution modifier.

Pseudopod.name: 伪足
Pseudopod.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) acid damage.

Dissolve Metal.name: Dissolve Metal
Dissolve Metal.description: Over the course of 1 minute, the gelatinooze can dissolve up to 1 pound of nonmagical metal it is touching.

Engulf.name: 吞没
Engulf.description:
The ooze moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Tiny creatures’ spaces. Whenever the ooze enters a creature’s space, the creature must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.

On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the ooze. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the ooze enters the creature’s space, and the creature takes 5 ([[/r 2d4]]) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can’t breathe, is restrained, and takes 10 ([[/r 4d4]]) acid damage at the start of each of the ooze’s turns. When the ooze moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.

An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the ooze.

Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 ([[/r 1d8 + 4]]) piercing damage, and the target is @condition[grappled] (escape DC 14). Reactive Mutations.description: Whenever the ooze takes damage, it gains resistance to that damage type immediately afterwards. The ooze can have up to two resistances from this trait. If the ooze has its maximum number of resistances, the oldest resistance is lost when a new one is gained.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ooze makes two Pseudopod attacks. It can replace one attack with Engulf.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
The ooze moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Medium or smaller creatures’ spaces. Whenever the ooze enters a creature’s space, the creature must make a [[/save 14 dex format=long]].

On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the ooze. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the ooze enters the creature’s space, and the creature takes [[/damage 2d8 acid average]] damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can’t breathe, is restrained, and takes [[/damage 4d8 acid average]] damage at the start of each of the ooze’s turns. When the ooze moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.

An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a [[/save 14 str format=long]]. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the ooze.

Pseudopod.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage and the target suffers one of the following random effects (roll a [[/r d8]]):

1. The target takes [[/damage 1d8 force average]] damage.

2. The target takes [[/damage 1d8 bludgeoning average]] damage.

3. The target takes [[/damage 1d8 piercing average]] damage.

4. The target takes [[/damage 1d8 slashing average]] damage.

5. The target takes [[/damage 1d8 cold average]] damage.

6. The target takes [[/damage 1d8 fire average]] damage.

7. The target takes [[/damage 1d8 lightning average]] damage.

8. The target takes [[/damage 1d8 thunder average]] damage.

Spider Climb.description: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Reactive Mutations.description: Whenever the ooze takes damage, it gains resistance to that damage type immediately afterwards. The ooze can have up to two resistances from this trait. If the ooze has its maximum number of resistances, the oldest resistance is lost when a new one is gained.

Legendary Resistance (3/Day).name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
Legendary Resistance (3/Day).description: If the ooze fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ooze uses Engulf and makes three Pseudopod attacks.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
The ooze moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Gargantuan or smaller creatures’ spaces. Whenever the ooze enters a creature’s space, the creature must make a [[/save 21 dex format=long]].

On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the ooze. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the ooze enters the creature’s space, and the creature takes [[/damage 2d20 acid average]] damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can’t breathe, is restrained, and takes [[/damage 4d20 acid average]] damage at the start of each of the ooze’s turns. When the ooze moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.

An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a [[/save 21 str format=long]]. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the ooze.

Attack.name: Attack
Attack.description: The ooze makes one Pseudopod attack.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft. , one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage and the target suffers one of the following random effects (roll a [[/r d20]]):

1. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 force average]] damage.

2. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 bludgeoning average]] damage.

3. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 piercing average]] damage.

4. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 slashing average]] damage.

5. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 cold average]] damage.

6. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 fire average]] damage.

7. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 lightning average]] damage.

8. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 thunder average]] damage.

9. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 necrotic average]] damage.

10. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 radiant average]] damage.

11. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 poison average]] damage.

12. The target takes [[/damage 1d20 psychic average]] damage.

13. The target must succeed on a [[/save 21 str format=long]] or be &reference[restrained]. The target or a creature within reach of the target can use its action to make a [[/save 21 str format=long]] , freeing the restrained creature on a success.

14. The target must succeed on a [[/save 21 wis format=long]] or be afflicted by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{confusion} spell for 1 minute*.

15. The target must succeed on a [[/save 21 con format=long]] or be afflicted by the reduce effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WahI41a3goVUg0x1]{enlarge/reduce} spell for 1 minute*.

16. The target must succeed on a [[/save 21 con format=long]] or be afflicted by the enlarge effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.WahI41a3goVUg0x1]{enlarge/reduce} spell for 1 minute*.

17. The target must succeed on a [[/save 21 con format=long]] or be afflicted by the @UUID[Compendium.heliana-core.items-heliana-gelatinous-polyhedrooze.Item.cEOAj9HDKICigGAb]{zippit}. spell for 1 minute*.

18. The target must succeed on a [[/save 21 con format=long]] or its hit point maximum is reduced by 10 ([[/r 1d20]]) until it finishes a long rest. The ooze regains a number of hit points equal to this value. A creature whose hit point maximum is reduced to 0 dies.

19. The target must succeed on a [[/save 21 str format=long]] or be engulfed by the ooze.

20. Roll twice more on this table.

*These spells don’t require concentration. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Pseudopod.name: Pseudopod
Pseudopod.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 ([[/r 1d6 + 3]]) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ([[/r 1d6]]) acid damage.

Corrode Object.name: Corrode Object
Corrode Object.description: The ooze touches a Medium or smaller nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried, causing it to corrode and dissolve over the course of 1 minute.

Born for the Saddle.name: Born for the Saddle
Born for the Saddle.description: The ooze grips firmly on to any object that is inserted into its body to be used as a saddle. A creature riding the ooze on one such saddle has advantage on saving throws made to avoid being dismounted.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The ooze can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Multiattack.name: Multiattack
Multiattack.description: The ooze makes two Pseudopod attacks. It can replace one attack with Engulf.

Engulf.name: Engulf
Engulf.description:
The ooze moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Small or smaller creatures’ spaces. Whenever the ooze enters a creature’s space, the creature must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw.

On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the ooze. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the ooze enters the creature’s space, and the creature takes 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can’t breathe, is restrained, and takes 14 ([[/r 4d6]]) acid damage at the start of each of the ooze’s turns. When the ooze moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.

An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 13 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the ooze.
